title: Pasta Carbonara
description: Classic Italian pasta with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and pepper.
preparation: Cook spaghetti in salted boiling water.
Fry pancetta until crispy.
Beat eggs with Parmesan and pepper.
Drain spaghetti and mix quickly with egg mixture and pancetta.
Serve immediately.

title: Spaghetti Bolognese
description: Rich tomato meat sauce served with spaghetti noodles.
preparation: Cook spaghetti in salted water.
Sauté onion and garlic in olive oil until fragrant.
Add minced beef and cook until browned.
Add tomatoes and tomato paste, simmer for 30 minutes.
Season with salt and pepper.
Serve sauce over spaghetti.

title: Pesto Penne
description: Penne pasta tossed in fresh basil pesto sauce.
preparation: Cook penne in salted boiling water.
Blend basil, pine nuts, Parmesan, garlic, and olive oil to make pesto.
Drain pasta and toss with pesto.
Serve with extra Parmesan if desired.

title: Sushi Roll
description: Fresh sushi rolls with salmon, avocado, and cucumber.
preparation: Cook and season sushi rice.
Slice salmon, avocado, and cucumber.
Place nori on bamboo mat, spread rice evenly.
Add fillings and roll tightly.
Cut and serve with soy sauce and wasabi.

title: Udon
description: Thick udon noodles in broth.
preparation: Cook udon noodles and drain.
Heat dashi, soy sauce, and mirin to make broth.
Place noodles in bowl and pour broth over.
Garnish with green onions and toppings.

title: Chicken Katsu Curry
description: Crispy chicken cutlet served with rich Japanese curry and rice.
preparation: Cook rice separately.
Coat chicken with flour, egg, and panko, then fry until golden.
Sauté onion and carrot, add water and curry roux, simmer.
Slice chicken, serve with rice and curry sauce.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
description: Spicy and creamy Indian chicken curry served with rice.
preparation: Marinate chicken in yogurt and masala paste.
Grill or pan-fry chicken pieces.
Sauté onion, add tomato puree and simmer.
Add chicken and cream, cook until thickened.
Serve with rice and garnish with cilantro.

title: Butter Chicken
description: Tender chicken in a creamy spiced tomato sauce.
preparation: Marinate chicken in yogurt and paste.
Cook onion, add tomato puree and spices.
Add chicken and cook until tender.
Stir in cream and butter.
Serve with rice.

title: Vegetable Biryani
description: Fragrant spiced rice with mixed vegetables.
preparation: Cook rice until 70% done.
Fry onions and vegetables with biryani paste.
Layer rice and vegetable mix in pot.
Add yogurt and herbs between layers.
Cover and steam until fully cooked.
Garnish with fried onions and mint.

title: Beef Tacos
description: Tacos filled with seasoned beef, lettuce, cheese, and salsa.
preparation: Cook beef with taco seasoning.
Prepare lettuce, cheese, and salsa.
Fill taco shells with beef and toppings.
Serve immediately.

title: Chicken Quesadilla
description: Grilled tortilla filled with chicken, cheese, and veggies.
preparation: Sauté bell pepper and onion until soft.
Layer chicken, veggies, and cheese on one half of each tortilla.
Fold and cook on skillet until golden brown and cheese melts.
Cut and serve with salsa and sour cream.

title: Guacamole with Chips
description: Creamy avocado dip served with crispy tortilla chips.
preparation: Mash avocados in a bowl.
Add tomato, onion, lime juice, and cilantro.
Season with salt and mix.
Serve immediately with tortilla chips.

title: Greek Salad
description: Tomatoes, cucumbers, olives, and feta cheese with olive oil.
preparation: Combine tomatoes, cucumber, onion, and olives in a bowl.
Add feta cheese cubes.
Drizzle with olive oil, sprinkle oregano and salt.
Toss gently and serve.

title: Caesar Salad
description: Romaine lettuce with Caesar dressing, croutons, and parmesan.
preparation: Wash and chop lettuce.
Toss lettuce with Caesar dressing.
Add croutons and Parmesan.
Season with black pepper and serve.

title: Chocolate Brownies
description: Rich, fudgy brownies with a crispy top.
preparation: Melt chocolate and butter together.
Whisk eggs and sugar until fluffy.
Combine with melted chocolate.
Fold in flour and salt.
Pour into baking pan and bake at 180°C for 30 minutes.
Cool before slicing.

title: Cheesecake
description: Classic creamy cheesecake with a graham cracker crust.
preparation: Mix crushed graham crackers with melted butter, press into pan.
Beat cream cheese and sugar until smooth.
Add eggs one at a time, then sour cream and vanilla.
Pour over crust and bake at 160°C for 1 hour.
Cool and refrigerate at least 4 hours before serving.

title: Fruit Tart
description: Crispy tart crust filled with cream and fresh fruits.
preparation: Bake tart crust until golden and cool.
Fill crust with pastry cream.
Arrange sliced fruits decoratively.
Brush with apricot glaze for shine.
Chill before serving.

title: Pad Thai
description: Thai stir-fried noodles with shrimp, tofu, and peanuts.
preparation: Soak rice noodles until soft.
Sauté tofu and shrimp.
Add noodles and sauce, stir-fry.
Push to side, scramble eggs, then mix.
Add bean sprouts and peanuts before serving.

title: Green Curry
description: Spicy Thai green curry with chicken and vegetables.
preparation: Sauté curry paste until fragrant.
Add chicken and stir-fry.
Pour in coconut milk, bring to boil.
Add vegetables and simmer until tender.
Season with fish sauce and garnish with basil.

title: Tom Yum Soup
description: Hot and sour Thai soup with shrimp and mushrooms.
ingredients: Chili paste, fish sauce, lime juice
preparation: Bring broth to boil with lemongrass and lime leaves.
Add mushrooms and cook until soft.
Add shrimp and cook until pink.
Season with chili paste, fish sauce, and lime juice.
Serve hot.
